author: Matthew Coates (M.C.)
description: In a similar style to an Espresso Martini but with very different ingredients including Guinness stout and coffee liqueur in place of espresso coffee.
name: Stout Fellow
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Dark cr√®me de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE (BEWARE - the stout may be explosive in your shaker so hold both ends more firmly than usual) all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
